Objects.Name: fountain
Objects.Description: A granite fountain is gurgling here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The fountain is made of black granite and the water in it looks and invitingto drink.  In the center is a 'SPADE' shaped centerstone that seems to havewriting all over it.

Objects.Name: fouton
Objects.Description: A Fouton(tm) is sitting here in the corner
Objects.ExtraDescription: A fouton couch is here with a blue matress and a light oak frame.  It alsodoubles as a bed when it is flattened to sleep two.

Objects.Name: Beertap
Objects.Description: A beertap is here to dispense beer.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The tap is made of chrome as is the spigot and it hasa wooden handle that serves as a valve to allow the beerto flow. On the handle are the words SAM ADAMS.

Objects.Name: coffee dispenser
Objects.Description: A coffee dispenser is here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The dispenser is attached to a big 5 gallon drum and there is a tray belowwith a button.  The dispenser is made of chrome and wood.

Objects.Name: mug beer
Objects.Description: An empty beer mug is here ready for use.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The mug is rather large and tall.  It is also very cold, chilled before beingplaced out for use by the patrons.

Objects.Name: coffee cup coffee
Objects.Description: A large empty coffee cup is here ready for use.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The cup is white crockery and a fair sized mug to allow a good portion ofcoffee to be drank from it.

Objects.Name: Watertap
Objects.Description: A water tap is here dripping into the sink.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The tap is a crookneck tap made by Kohler and it is a swivel head that can bemoved left or right.

Objects.Name: countrytime fountain
Objects.Description: A Countrytime(tm) Lemonaid fountain drink machine is here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The fountain machine sits in the corner and has a one glass dispenser infront of a five gallon jug of the yellow delicious liquid.

Objects.Name: juice glass juice
Objects.Description: An empty tall frost-covered glass is here ready for use.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The glass is large and tall, able to hold a lot of the drink available foreither water, beer, lemonaid.  It is frost-covered of course, kept on ice beforeit is used by the patrons.

Objects.Name: cabinet storage
Objects.Description: A large storage cabinet is attached to the wall behind the counter.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The storage cabinets are attached to the wall and have large swinging doorsto allow acess to the inside.  It is white colored to match the sterile colorand green that make up the coffee bar.

Objects.Name: tea brewer
Objects.Description: A Lipton Tea(tm) tea barrel is here with a dispenser.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The Tea Brewer machine is a steel drum with a dispenser on the front and aplatform where you place your glass.  It has a red button to dispense the tea.

Objects.Name: milk
Objects.Description: A milk dispensing machine is here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The machine is a steel drum with a single dispenser over a platform for theglass.  There is a trigger to push glass against to make it dispense.

Objects.Name: wine glass wine
Objects.Description: A crystal wine glass is here ready for use.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The glass is tall and round, made of superb crystal that gleams stunningly inthe light.

Objects.Name: shelf wooden
Objects.Description: A wooden shelf is attached to the wall.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The shelf is made of oak and is attached to the wall using 'L' Brackets intothe wall below, It makes for perfect storage.

Objects.Name: whisky bottle whisky
Objects.Description: A bottle of whisky is here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The bottle is brown and it has a white and red label marked "Wild Turkey"

Objects.Name: ale shotglass ale
Objects.Description: A short shotglass is here ready for use.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The shot glass is small and the size of a good sized coffee cup and it ismade of glass.

Objects.Name: whiskytap
Objects.Description: A whisky dispenser is here giving shots.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The tap is made of metal and it has a small platform.  Place a drink againstthe metal tigger and it will dispense a perfect shot of whiskey.

Objects.Name: barrier construction
Objects.Description: A construction barrier is here on its metal spidery legs.

Objects.Name: couch
Objects.Description: A plush couch is here in front of a coffee table.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The couch is long, has a frame of oak wood and a long blue cushion.  Ithappens to be a Futon (tm).

Objects.Name: LazyBoy recliner
Objects.Description: A LazyBoy(tm) recliner is here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The recliner is made of leather and it swivels on an iron pedistal.  Theleather is light brown trimmed in black.

Objects.Name: sign
Objects.Description: A construction sign is here nailed to a 2x4

Objects.Name: bigscreen TV
Objects.Description: A big screen 51" TV is here playing the local sports channel highlights.

Objects.Name: stool barstool
Objects.Description: A barstool is here next to the counter wanting to be sat on
Objects.ExtraDescription: The stood has a green top of padded foam and the legs are made of metal.

Objects.Name: hardhat construction
Objects.Description: A yellow construction hardhat is here on the desk.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The helmet is yellow, made off plastic and it has a logoof the Witt's Construction company on the center front of it.There is a plastic adjustable insert to fit the wearers head.

Objects.Name: sign
Objects.Description: A small freestanding sign is here on a rod and pedistal.

Objects.Name: neck guard
Objects.Description: A titanium necckguard is here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The ascot is made of silk and is of a sheer material.  It flows nicely in thebreeze to make you look uber cool.

Objects.Name: smock
Objects.Description: A builders smock is here in a heap.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The smock is blue and white with the logo of TBA on the back of it.  It hasno sleeves but is protectant against impact by items while building.

Objects.Name: elbow
Objects.Description: Protetive elbow guards are here hanging from the straps
Objects.ExtraDescription: The elbow guards are soft and white and slip on the arms for protection ofthe joints while working.

Objects.Name: jeans
Objects.Description: A pair of Levi (tm) 501 jeans is here in a heap.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The levis are stone washed blue jeans and they are trimmed in the ypicalorange that usually come with the thread pattern.  They look very well worn.

Objects.Name: gloves
Objects.ShortDescription: a pair of calf hide gloves
Objects.Description: A pair of thick calf hide gloves
Objects.ExtraDescription: The gloves are thick calf hide and are colored orange one one side with brownpalm sides.  They help to not wreck your hands while working hard on physicaltasks.

Objects.Name: Rebock's Sneakers
Objects.Description: Rebock's Hightop Sneakers are sitting here as a pair.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The sneakers are white and blue and they are hightops for what appears to beBasketball, but for just general wear they are quite comfortable.

Objects.Name: labcoat
Objects.Description: An official TBAMUD Labcoat hangs here from a hook.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The coat is white and trimmed and blue and on the back of it is the TBAMUDLogo,

Objects.Name: belt
Objects.Description: A leather belt with a gold clasp is here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The belt is black woven leather and it has a gold clasp in the front.

Objects.Name: rolex
Objects.ShortDescription: a gold and silver Rolex Watch
Objects.Description: WOW! A real gold and silver Rolex Watch is laying here!
Objects.ExtraDescription: The watch is really fancy, showing time in three different countries can gounder water 300m and is made of a bright silver and gold body.

Objects.Name: gold chain
Objects.Description: A decorative gold chain
Objects.ExtraDescription: The chain is linked gold and it twinkles in the light.

Objects.Name: hammer
Objects.Description: A TBAMUD Builder's Hammer is here laying head down.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The hammer is very small, like the size of a 20 lb sledgehammer but it hasthe bite of a warhammer.  It should be ample protection against mobs.

Objects.Name: ring class
Objects.Description: A TBA Builder's Ring is here laying in the dust.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The ring is a gold signet with a silver center and it has the TBAMUD Logo inthe center of it.  It signify's you are an official builder!

Objects.Name: skirt
Objects.Description: A pleasted 503 Levi (tm) skirt is here in a heap.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The skirt is a typical stone washed blue with the orange thread and on theback is the paper marker showing the size.  It is about migh thigh to kneelength.

Objects.Name: shield
Objects.Description: A powerful titanium shield sits tipped against the wall.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The titanium shield is blue and has the seal of TBA MUD rampant on the frontand center of it.  It is made of titanium metal.

Objects.Name: bench loveseat
Objects.Description: A comfy looking French loveseat is here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The armchair is made of leather and it is a designed like a bench.  It hasplush cushions on the back and bottom that are blue with orange, yellow, white,and green stripes on one corner of the pillow.

Objects.Name: key golden
Objects.Description: A stumpy golden key glistens in the light
Objects.ExtraDescription: The key is short and twisted in a unique shape as it is an old fashioned typekey.

Objects.Name: tablet
Objects.Description: A purple tablet is here blinking and chirping.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The tablet is about 12" square and it has a touch face with a dark purpleshell back, It seems to blink and flash when she touches the face of it.

Objects.Name: hotttub
Objects.Description: A steaming corner hottub is here bubbling ominously.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The hotttub is about 8 feet in diameter and holds up to 10 people.  The waterbubbles and churns, looking very inviting.

Objects.Name: toilet
Objects.Description: A toilet is here made of porclein.
Objects.ExtraDescription: Be sure to Flush!

Objects.Name: sink
Objects.Description: A sink and long granite counter is here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The counters are made of granite and are immaculately carved with suchprecision into a smooth flowing shape and designs all over them.

Objects.Name: tub clawtub
Objects.ShortDescription: an old fashioned claw tub and shower
Objects.Description: An old fashioned claw tub and shower is here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The shower is a gold tube and a nozzle that is located on one side of the tuband the water pours down over the person or persons.  The valve is located justabove the fixture on the bottom of the tub that fills it.

Objects.Name: bench
Objects.Description: A short teak bench is here sitting on its legs.
Objects.ExtraDescription: A short teak bench is here sitting on its four carved legs, of an orientaltype design.

Objects.Name: spring
Objects.Description: A gurgling spring is here splashing into a golden basin.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The basin is made of gold and it holds the water as it splashes out from thespring from the ground.  When full it runs into what appears to be a channelleading to the lagoon.

Objects.Name: statue
Objects.Description: A guardian statue of Rumble is here next to a pedistal.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The statue is a guardian to this shrine, it depicts one of the immortals ofTBA and his power and influence over all who worship here.  He stands clad as aBattle Mage, in flowing robes and carries a staff.  His hair is long and flowingas he seems to be raising the staff in battle.  You seem to feel at ease by thisstatue.

Objects.Name: Opie
Objects.Description: A guardian statue of Opie is here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The statue is a guardian to this shine, it depicts one of the immortals ofTBA and the influence of steath and cunning to all who worhip here.  He standsclad in carved battle armor of leather, a loose flowing shirt and a sash abouthis waist.  In his hand he carries a dagger that is thrust outward in a backstabmotion.  You feel a strange surge of adventure looking at this statue.

Objects.Name: Welcor
Objects.Description: A guardian statue of Welcor is here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The statue is a guardian to this shine, it depicts one of the immortals ofTBA and the influence of Justice to all who worship here.  He/She stands clad ina long flowing set of robes and he/she carries a warhammer in their hand.  Thefeeling of peace overwhelms the senses when you look at the statue that seems tobe floating and glowing brightly.
